snippet: The N.B.A. hoped to phase in gradual increases to the salary cap — a process it called smoothing — to avoid a single dramatic spike in free-agent contract amounts.
abstract: NBA Roundup; players’ union rejects NBA proposal to artificially limit increases to salary cap once national television deals begin before 2016-2017 season; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. hoped to phase in gradual increases to the salary cap — a process it called smoothing — to avoid a single dramatic spike in free-agent contract amounts.

headline.print_headline: With TV Deals Ahead, Players Reject Salary Cap Limits
